dosage_label: Adults and children 12 years and over: 1 tablet every 4-6 hours while symptoms persist. If pain or fever does not respond to 1 tablet, 2 tablets may be used. Do not exceed 6 tablets in 24 hours unless directed by a doctor.
warnings_label: Ask a doctor before use if you have stomach bleeding risk, heart disease, high blood pressure, or take blood thinners. Stop use and ask a doctor if you experience allergic reaction.

dosage_label: Adults and children 12 years and over: 2 caplets every 6 hours while symptoms persist. Do not exceed 6 caplets in 24 hours.
warnings_label: Liver warning: Severe liver damage may occur if you take more than directed or with alcohol.

dosage_label: Use only as prescribed. Follow the directions on your prescription label. Complete the full course unless instructed otherwise by a healthcare professional.
warnings_label: Tell your doctor if you have penicillin allergy. Seek urgent care for severe allergic reaction.

dosage_label: Adults and children 6 years and over: 1 tablet once daily. Do not take more than 1 tablet in 24 hours.
warnings_label: May cause drowsiness. Avoid alcohol and be careful when driving.

dosage_label: Use only as prescribed. Follow the directions on your prescription label.
warnings_label: Discuss kidney issues and other risk factors with a healthcare professional.
